The young driver of Grants, who killed a retiree in Abdulino, will be tried (18+)

The criminal case against a 19-year-old boy was brought before the Abdoulin District Court.
5 February19:13Comments

In Orenburg, members of the LNG traded alcohol and cigarettes were convicted

The total amount of pulmonary alcohol was at least 8 million roubles and 500,000 roubles of tobacco were reported to the Prosecutor ' s Office in Orenburg.
5 February17:44video videoComments

A resident of Orenburg has been taken to Toyoto Kraun from Abkhazia without paying 2.6 million roubles

The officers of the Orenburg Region of the Samara Customs Service, in collaboration with DPS officials, identified a car smuggled into Russia.
5 February16:14Comments

In October, four people were injured in the accident, including a teenager

The road was not divided by WAZ-21144 and Lada Largus.
5 February15:32Comments

In Orenburg province, a male driver will be tried (18+)

An investigation into a criminal case against a resident of the Buzuluku district has been completed. He is incriminated by the commission of an offence under article 216, paragraph 2, of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation - Violation of safety rules in the conduct of construction or other work which has resulted in the death of a person in negligence.
5 February14:25Comments

In Orenburg, a man stabbed a friend and threw a knife (18+)

The suspect was detained within 24 hours.
5 February12:40Comments

In Novotrovica, a man released gas in a rented apartment and set fire to the apartment.

The pyroman escaped the criminal punishment, and the damages will have to be paid.
5 February12:17Comments

In Orenburg, rescue assistance required a 85-year-old pensioner

The director of the Rescue Service reported that a woman fell on the floor in one of the apartments on the Britius of the Cortelev, and asked for help because she couldn't stand up on her own.
5 February11:08Comments

In Orsk, the driver was killed and two passengers were injured by Chevy Niwa (18+)

The accident occurred on the eve of 20:40 on the 10th kilometre of the M5 Ural road to Orscu City.
5 February10:57Comments

In Orenburg, a gas boiler exploded in a private house.

There's a unit in the field.
5 February10:47Comments

In Buzuluke, the child swallowed the battery

Police officers determine the circumstances of the accident. The child is in hospital under medical supervision.
5 February10:24Comments

In Orenburg, 23 houses were left without heat and hot water.

The Orenburg heat networks repaired the damage to the 500 mm pipe in the thermal chamber in the Stepn area of the Regional Centre all night.
5 February09:14Comments

A teenager from Buguruslan hurt an old lady.

The young man has taken all of her savings from an old woman by deception.
4 February21:48Comments

In Orenburg, a man fell under the ice.

The victim himself was able to call the rescuers.
4 February20:14video videoComments

In Abkhazia, a tourist from Orenburj died.

The tragic tragedy ended with a visit to Abkhazia for a citizen of Kuwandok. He died getting off the ditch.
4 February13:15Comments

A retiree was killed in the Oktyabr district of Priora

The pedestrian accident occurred on the evening of 31 January in the village of Krasno October Octyabrsky District of Orenburg.
3 February17:59Comments

In Orenburg district, a car washing accident in which a child was injured

The crash occurred on 1 February at 8 p.m. on the 20th kilometre of the Mosque-Ryazan-Penza-Samara-Ufa-Celabinsk road (access to the Orsk crossing point).
3 February10:27Comments

The father and son of Kuwandaka were fined and taken away by cars because of the sale of " burnt cigarettes "

Both heard the verdict.
3 February08:13Comments

The furniture collector from Orenburg borrowed, sold the car and moved it together with the stockpilings.

Total damage - about 445,000 roubles.
2 February19:30Comments

Twelve years: the culprit under Orenburg did not commute the sentence (18+)

The Orenburg Regional Court examined the appeal of the culprit of the accident, where the drunken lihac on the new year holidays from 22 to 23 killed two people on the Nejin Highway and healed two others.
2 February17:13Comments

Cases

This section orenday is devotedAccidents, Tragedies, Disasters and Crimesrelevantin Orenburgand Orenburg.
We're following the accident reports and we're telling you the most.Importantand relevant ones.

Avia and car crashes, accidents

Transport events unfortunately occur in large quantitiesevery day♪ Orenday does not report a number of situations, such as " bats " on the road. Our task is to inform readers promptly of the events that need to be known.

11 FebruaryA plane collapsed in PodmoskovjeSaratov airlines with orchards on board. It was the Moskva Orsk flight.71 passengersand crew members are dead.

Landing accidentUrban Districttook seven lives.♪ 18-year-old Camille Kuvatov, like saving a guardian angel, losing her parents, she became a guardian of a younger sister.

Large scale

“Snow prisoners”In 2016, due to heavy metal in the snowOrenburg-OrskThere are dozens of cars. People who freeze in their cars waited more than 15 hours.

Crimes and penalties

We're tracking information on crimes and telling people who and for what he's done or he's gonna be punished, be it.gangs or killersof commissionedthe killing of entrepreneursin Orenburg

Of course, it's impossible to keep quiet about when the Ringers becomeGlobalMMM -Family Copier CooperativeI left hundreds of people without blood. By investing money on interest, many have copied for surgery, housing and other important needs.

Officials often have problems with the law. For example,criminal proceedingsnow former head of OrenburgEugenia ArapovaconvictedHead of Gennady Borisov♪TrialsThe Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Labour and Employment of the Orenburg Region, the Ministry of Agriculture of the Region, addressed them.

Search operations

We don't stay indifferent if the security forces or volunteers ask for help and help from the bandwidths.searching for people♪ Stillnot establishedlocationA serial maniac from Orsca Valeria Andreeva♪

Stay on all the news with me.Orenday♪

Use of materials

All rights to be published on orenday are protected under the law of the Russian Federation. Any use of materials is permitted only in agreement with the Editor, with a mandatory active reference to the source.

The editorial is not responsible for the validity of advertisements posted on the website orenday.ru, the website content of the hyperlinks and the comments. Comments to the publications are personal views of the website users.
